column4: I'm having a weird error with my keyboard, whenever I press up gnome-screenshot is run
well, see the thing is, it only started doing this after I ran mplayer in fullscreen mode
Um...hmm...far as I know...there's a shortcut assigned to your up key.
Could you please go to System -> Preferences -> Keyboard Shortcuts and look beside the heading Take A Screenshot?
tells me that "Up" would make typing impossible which I agree, but I can't remove the shortcut :P
Odd. Set that back to Print.
Set it back to print, log out and log in. Maybe that'll clear it up?
it's been set to print the whole time though :\
Try it for its own sake? :-)
I have another unrelated question, will in  a bit :D thanks
I have no clue about that. :)
But I'm sure the experienced users here can help you fix that.
fyi restarting X fixed up arrow issue
